/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the background, a large industrial building stands tall, its smokestack reaching towards the sky, a testament to the city's bustling activity. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a beautiful contrast to the greenery below.
